summary: This is an internal FBI email from Assistant Director Cathy Milhoan to FBI SACs and ADICs, summarizing Director Christopher Wray's testimony before the Senate Judiciary Committee and providing the FBI's official response to a House Judiciary Committee report alleging the FBI targeted Catholics. The email includes attachments of hearing materials.

persons.name: Milhoan, Catherine L.
persons.role: Assistant Director, FBI Office of Public Affairs
persons.context: Author of the email, sending FBI Director Wray's testimony materials and the FBI's official response to media regarding a House Judiciary Committee report.

persons.name: Wray, Christopher
persons.context: Testified before the Senate Judiciary Committee on FBI oversight; his opening statement and hearing transcript are attached to the email.

connections.description: Milhoan, as Assistant Director of Public Affairs, is disseminating information about Director Wray's testimony and the FBI's official position.

events.title: FBI Director Wray Testifies Before Senate Judiciary Committee
events.description: FBI Director Christopher Wray testified at a Senate Judiciary Committee hearing on FBI oversight.

events.title: House Judiciary Committee Report Issued
events.description: The House Judiciary Committee and its Weaponization Select Subcommittee issued a report alleging the FBI targeted Catholics, which the FBI's response in this email disputes.

keyFacts: The document is an internal FBI email from Assistant Director Cathy Milhoan dated December 5, 2023.
It disseminates materials related to FBI Director Christopher Wray's testimony before the Senate Judiciary Committee on FBI oversight.
It contains the FBI's official on-the-record response denying allegations from a House Judiciary Committee report that the FBI targeted Catholics, calling such characterization false.
The FBI states an internal review found no malicious intent to target Catholics or any religious faith and that a problematic intelligence product was quickly removed from systems.
The email and its attachments (EFTA00160590) are part of the Epstein case document release, though their direct connection to the Epstein case is not stated in this excerpt.
